otherBenefits.name: Accidental loss or Damage to Home Electronic Appliances
otherBenefits.coverageLimit:
Coverage Amount : SGD 2,500

Accidental loss or damage to Home Electronic Appliances such as:
1. Kitchen appliances: refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, microwave oven, cooker hood and hob
2. Home appliances: television, audio equipment, air-conditioner, washer/dryer
3. Personal appliance: tablets, laptops, computers
(Excess: SGD 100)

otherBenefits.name: Additional Home Content Sum Insured
otherBenefits.description: Increase sum insured of your home content such as movable possessions within the insured premises owned by you or your family.
otherBenefits.groupName: All Risks Home Content and Renovations
otherBenefits.groupBenefitDescription: All Risk cover extends protection to sudden, accidental damage - not just fire or theft  for home contents including renovations.
